Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application No. 20025400 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Project known as East 119th Street Townhouses, located in Community Board 11, Council District No. 8, Borough of the Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.

Application no. 20025382 HAQ, an Urban Development Action Area Project known as Arverne Phase 1A, located in Community Board 14, Council District no. 32, Borough of Queens.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.

Application no. 20025280 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Project known as Round III-Bronx Site, located in Community Boards 1, 2 and 3, Council Districts no. 15, 16, 17 and 18, Borough of the Bronx.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, Round III-Bronx Site Project, Bronx (20025280HAX)

Items.Title: Application no. 20025208 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 1840 7th Avenue, Council District no. 9, Borough of Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law for an exemption from real property taxes.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020250 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 28 to allow a 406 space public parking garage.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Special Permit, CD#28, Queens (020250ZSQ)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020249 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 28 to allow acessory off-street parking spaces to be located without regard to zoning lot lines and to allow location of buildings without regard to applicable yard regulations.
